content:
Among them are the Media-Poole blogger Medvedchuk and a deputy of the City Council who wanted to escape to the Russian Federation.

About thisShe reported March 20SBU.

The attackers justified the armed aggression of the Russian Federation, heated the Russian invaders and called for admiration for the entire territory of our country.

Thus, in Cherkasy oblast, a deputy of the Chyhyryn City Council was exposed, who publicly justified the war crimes of the ruscists and was waiting for the capture of the region.

According to the investigation, the official spread anti -Ukrainian publications among his environment. The destructive content was taken from Prokremliv information resources and supplemented it with "author's" posts.

It is also documented that the person involved was directly connected with the exnaissance traitor from the forbidden Party of Regions, Vladimir Oliynyk, who is hiding abroad.

In correspondence with the former "regional", he reported misinformation, which discredited Ukrainian soldiers, and collected data on the mood of the population in Cherkasy region.

In addition, another resident of Cherkasy region was detained, who called calls for armed seizure of state power in Ukraine.

To spread hostile agitation, he created several "telegrams"-and the Facebook community and administered YouTub Channel.

In Kyiv, the SSU exposed a blogger who 'whitewashed' the subversive activities of the ex-MP-traitor Medvedchuk and collaborator Stremousov.

To do this, she used her own pages in telegram, pokes, instagram with a total audience of more than 100,000 users.

Two more pro -Russian agitators were exposed in Dnipropetrovsk. One of them is a former law enforcement officer who praised fighters of occupation groups of the Russian Federation.

Another involved was a resident of Novomoskovsk. On the personal page on the social network, he spread fakes about the forces of defense, which are fighting on the front line.

A resident of the frontline area was detained in Donetsk region, who called on bombard Kiev and heroned the militants of the Russian Akhmat group.

Investigators of the SBU have now been informed by the persons suspected of two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

Якreported the armyinform, a traitor was detained in Kharkiv, which corrected blows in the city and then "lay on the bottom".
title: Six Agitators of Rashism reported suspicion
description: This was reported on March 20 by the SBU. The attackers justified the armed aggression of the Russian Federation, ...
author: Army Inform
